name: NEHA💝
greetingText: Even your name makes my heart smile. 😊
wishText: You’re not just a part of my life, you’re the beat in my heart, the thought in my mind, and the soul of every moment I breathe. 💫
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday My Love! 🥺💝 Even though I can't be there in Mumbai with you right now... my love is flying across every mile from Pune to wrap you in the warmest hug 💌
text2: I wanted to just wish you simply...
text4: Because someone as amazing as you deserves something truly
outroText: Even though we’re miles apart between Pune and Mumbai...
replayText: Your love is the bridge that connects our hearts every single day. 💝 No distance can dull the spark we share, no timezone can slow the heartbeat I feel when I think of you.
